Edges-Combat -- Male Dragonfolk Heroic Adventurer
Attributes (11 Points):
Agility: d10 Smarts: d6 Spirit: d8 Strength: d8 Vigor: d10
Attribute Notes:
Cold-Blooded: 10 min in 60F/18C or below inflicts -1 Agility, Strength, and Vigor
Obese: -1 Strength Step (worn gear)
Skills (16 Points):
Academics: (sma) d6 Fighting: (agi) d10 Stealth: (agi) d8
Athletics: (agi) d10 Notice: (sma) d4 Survival: (sma) d6
Common Knowledge: (sma) d6 Persuasion: (spi) d4-1 Taunt: (sma) d6
Skill Notes:
Mean: -1 Persuasion
Dirty Fighter: +2 Fighting (performing Test)
Size: 1
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 12; Edge: 12; Skill: 4
Description Notes: Obese: +1 Size
Features
Edges (6 points): Assassin; Charge; Close Fighting; Defender; Dirty Fighter; Double Shot; Formation Fighter; Improved Close Fighting; Improved Double Shot; Improved Sneak Attack; Iron Jaw; Martial Flexibility; Missile Deflection; Opportunistic; Really Dirty Fighter; Roar; Savagery; Scorch; Shield Wall; Sneak Attack; Stunning Blow; Sunder; Take The Hit; Trick Shot; Uncanny Reflexes; Wing Gust Hindrances: Enemy; Mean; Obese; Shamed Dragonfolk Features: Armor +2; Bite; Breath Weapon; Claws; Cold-Blooded; Environmental Resistance (Heat); Environmental Weakness (Cold); Ill-Tempered
Feature Notes:
Ill-Tempered: Has Arrogant+ hindrance
Enemy: Individual or remote group wants character eliminated
Mean: Ill-tempered and disagreeable
Opportunistic: Joker gives an additional +2 to Trait and damage rolls
Shamed: Past event causes self-doubt
Combat
Parry: 8 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 10 (2) Pace/Run: 5/+d4
Armor: None Shield: Small Shield Weapons: Bite (d8+d4); Claws (d8+d4); Cutlass (d8+d6); Falchion (d8+d8 AP 1); Scythe (d8+d6); Unarmed (d8+d0)
Combat Notes:
Armor+2: +2 Armor
Bite: Fangs are a natural weapon
Claws: Claws are a natural weapon
Fighting Parry Modifier: +5 Parry
Improved Close Fighting: Increased Close Fighting effects
Improved Double Shot: Increased Double Shot effects
Obese: -1 Pace/-1 Run Step/+1 Toughness
Sneak Attack: Increased Assassin effects
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Arrogant+: Always takes on the biggest threat
Assassin: +d6 damage to Vulnerable foes and with The Drop
Breath Weapon: Successful Athletics inflicts 2d6 fire damage in a 9" cone or 12" line; critical failure inflicts fatigue on self
Charge: Fighting attack after 5" run inflicts +2 damage
Close Fighting: +2 attack and Parry with a knife against a more heavily-armed foe
Defender: May share shield Parry w/chosen adjacent ally
Double Shot: May fire or throw 2 projectiles 2/tn
Environmental Resistance (Heat): +4 vs. heat and fire effects/-4 damage from heat and fire
Environmental Weakness (Cold): -4 vs. cold effects/+4 damage from cold
Formation Fighter: Self and allies gain +1 Gang Up bonus (+4 max)
Improved Sneak Attack: May use Sneak Attack on a distracted foe
Iron Jaw: +2 Soak rolls/+2 Vigor vs. knockout
Martial Flexibility: May gain effects of a chosen combat edge for 5 rd 1/encounter
Missile Deflection: When armed, physical ranged attacks on self must match Parry to succeed
Really Dirty Fighter: Raise on a Test gives The Drop on target until target unshakes
Roar: May make an Intimidation Test against multiple targets in a 9" cone
Savagery: Wild Attack inflicts an additional +2 damage
Scorch: Breath weapon inflicts 1 die type higher damage; may choose to affect a cone or line
Shield Wall: +1/+2 Parry when adjacent to 1/2 allies w/this edge
Stunning Blow: Successful attack with a blunt weapon stuns (Vigor neg)
Sunder: +d6 damage when striking to break an object
Take The Hit: May reroll when Soaking or resisting Knockout
Trick Shot: May force foe to resist Athletics and Shooting Tests with Smarts instead of Agility
Uncanny Reflexes: Ignores penalty for normal Evasion; may attempt Evasion-2 for any area effect
Wing Gust: Successful Athletics shakes creatures of same size or smaller in a 9" cone (Vigor neg; Raise -2)
Notes
Validation Errors:
Edge Allocation: 6 available vs. 26 allocated
Wing Gust Edge: Requires advances (currently 12)>=4 and flight feature
